page.title: 12SCHOOLS IN THE BUNGAY AREA
page.content: There are five first schools, Flixton, Ditchingham,Bungay,St.Edmunds and Earsham.All these aim to create a happy atmosphere.Children can take part in extra-curricular activities as well as basic subjects. At St. Edmunds, the older children learn French. At nine, ten or eleven children can go to Bungay Middle School. Here there is the full range of subjects available, mostly class-teacher taught in the lower years and fully specialist taught by the fourth year. We feel that this is a lively, happy place and that our needs are thought of. At thirteen, most children transfer to Bungay High School. After the first year here, they follow mainly exam subjects. Pupils from 34 villages and two small towns go to this school. There are sixth form facilities there.
